opis: Prodaje se kuća u Rogoznici od 333 m2 bruto površine, udaljena samo 250 m od plaže s prekrasnim pogledom na more i predivnom okućnicom. Kuća se koristi za turistički najam. U prizemlju su dvije stambene jedinice, jedan veći stan od 85 m2 koji sadrži veliku spavaću sobu, kupaonu, kuhinju s blagovaonom, te veliki dnevni boravak s izlazom na natkrivenu terasu i apartman s jednom spavaćom sobom, kupaonom, kuhinjom s blagovaonicom te izlazom na terasu. Na prvom katu su 4 apartmana. Svaki apartman ima kuhinjnu, blagovaonu s dnevnim boravkom te izlaz na terasu s pogledom na more. Svi apartmani su klimatizirani. Uz kuću se također nalazi veliki parking i dva pomoćna objekta. Jedan pomoćni objekt je uređen kao ljetna kuhinja s velikim roštiljem i prostorom za sjedenje, a drugi služi kao ostava i alatnica. Fasada je obnovljena 2012. godine, a djelomična renovacija svih apartmana provedena je 2019. godine. Poseban šarm ovoj kući daje velika i pažljivo održavana okućnica, kultivirana raznim vrstama ukrasnog bilja te mediteranskih voćaka. Budući da se kuća nalazi u mirnom susjedstvu, nedaleko od plaže, te posjeduje sve dozvole za turistički najam može biti dobra investicija za one koji se žele baviti turizmom. Za sve dodatne informacije molimo obratite se agenciji. House for sale in Rogoznica of 333 m2 gross area, only 250 m from the beach with a beautiful sea view and a beautiful garden. The house is used for tourist rent. The ground floor has two residential units, one larger apartment of 85 m2 which contains a large bedroom, bathroom, kitchen with dining area, and a large living room with access to a covered terrace and a one bedroom apartment, bathroom, kitchen with dining area and exit to the terrace . On the first floor are 4 apartments. Each apartment has a kitchen, dining room with living room and exit to the terrace overlooking the sea. All apartments are air conditioned. Next to the house there is also a large parking lot and two auxiliary facilities. One ancillary facility is arranged as a summer kitchen with a large barbecue and seating area, and the other serves as a pantry and tool shed. The facade was renovated in 2012, and a partial renovation of all apartments was carried out in 2019. A special charm to this house is given by a large and carefully maintained garden, cultivated with various types of ornamental plants and Mediterranean fruit trees. Since the house is located in a quiet neighborhood, not far from the beach, and has all the permits for tourist rental can be a good investment for those who want to engage in tourism.
